comment.author: 87367694@N00
comment._content: Demolished for Woolworths...what a sad story!

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic appeared in the T&CJ report on the fire...I gather the photographer was G.A. Hills. nla.gov.au/nla.news-page6005426 ; article here nla.gov.au/nla.news-article71522132 ; the Evening News had a similar sketch view from the Hotel Arcadia in Pitt St (apparently drawn from this same photo) nla.gov.au/nla.news-article113866793

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Thanks, quasymody, for the photographer. Great work and I have added G.A. Hills to our Catalog record for these photographs. He was conveniently located nearby in Castlereagh Street
